sn1.33:1.2: Then, when the night had advanced, a number of devatās belonging to the Satullapa host, of stunning beauty, illuminating the entire Jeta’s Grove, approached the Blessed One. Having approached, they paid homage to the Blessed One and stood to one side.
sn1.33:1.3: Then one devatā, standing to one side, uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:3.1: Then another devatā uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:4.2: And further: Even when there’s little, giving is good.
sn1.33:5.1: “Some provide from what little they have,
sn1.33:5.2: Others who are affluent don’t like to give.
sn1.33:5.3: An offering given from what little one has
sn1.33:5.4: Is worth a thousand times its value. ”
sn1.33:6.1: Then another devatā uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:7.2: Even when there’s little, giving is good.
sn1.33:7.3: And further: When done with faith too, giving is good.
sn1.33:7.4: “Giving and warfare are similar, they say:
sn1.33:7.5: A few good ones conquer many.
sn1.33:7.6: If one with faith gives even a little,
sn1.33:7.7: He thereby becomes happy in the other world. ”
sn1.33:8.1: Then another devatā uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:9.2: Even when there’s little, giving is good.
sn1.33:9.3: When done with faith too, giving is good.
sn1.33:9.4: And further: The gift of a righteous gain is also good.
sn1.33:10.1: “When he gives a gift of a righteous gain
sn1.33:10.3: Having passed over Yama’s Vetaraṇi River,
sn1.33:10.4: That mortal arrives at celestial states. ”
sn1.33:11.1: Then another devatā uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:12.2: Even when there’s little, giving is good.
sn1.33:12.3: When done with faith too, giving is good;
sn1.33:12.4: The gift of a righteous gain is also good.
sn1.33:12.5: And further: Giving discriminately too is good.
sn1.33:13.1: “Giving discriminately is praised by the Fortunate One—
sn1.33:13.3: What is given to them bears great fruit
sn1.33:13.4: Like seeds sown in a fertile field. ”
sn1.33:14.1: Then another devatā uttered this inspired utterance in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.33:15.2: Even when there’s little, giving is good.
sn1.33:15.3: When done with faith too, giving is good;
sn1.33:15.4: The gift of a righteous gain is also good.
sn1.33:15.5: Giving with discretion too is good.
sn1.33:15.6: And further: Restraint towards living beings is also good.
sn1.33:16.1: “One who fares harming no living beings
sn1.33:16.2: Does no evil from fear of others’ censure.
sn1.33:16.3: In that they praise the timid, not the brave,
sn1.33:16.4: For out of fear the good do no evil. ”
sn1.33:17.1: Then another devatā said to the Blessed One:
sn1.33:17.2: “Which one, Blessed One, has spoken well?”
sn1.33:18.1: “You have all spoken well in a way.
sn1.33:19.1: “Surely giving is praised in many ways,
sn1.33:19.2: But the path of Dhamma surpasses giving.
sn1.33:19.3: For in the past and even long ago,
sn1.33:19.4: The good and wise ones attained Nibbāna. ”
